1: מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְתוֹדָ֑ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>of praise</n> הָרִ֥יעוּ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>Make a joyful noise</n> לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>all ye lands</n>
2: עִבְד֣וּ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>Serve</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>with gladness</n> בֹּ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before his presence</n> בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ <sup>7445 </sup> <n>with singing</n>
3: דְּע֗וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יְהוָה֮ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>ye that the LORD</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>he [is] God</n> הֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> עָ֭שָׂנוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[it is] he [that] hath made</n> [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣ו <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ק) אֲנַ֑חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>ourselves</n> עַ֝מּ֗וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>us and not we ourselves [we are] his people</n> וְצֹ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and the sheep</n> מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>4830 </sup> <n>of his pasture</n>
4: בֹּ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Enter</n> שְׁעָרָ֨יו ׀ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>into his gates</n> בְּתוֹדָ֗ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>with thanksgiving</n> חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו <sup>2691 </sup> <n>[and] into his courts</n> בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה <sup>8416 </sup> <n>with praise</n> הֽוֹדוּ־ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>be thankful</n> ל֝֗וֹ בָּרֲכ֥וּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>unto him [and] bless</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n>
5: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> יְ֭הֹוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[is] everlasting</n> חַסְדּ֑וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>his mercy</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> דֹּ֥ר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>[endureth] to all</n> וָ֝דֹ֗ר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n> אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>530 </sup> <n>and his truth</n>
